description: This file defines the C++ class `CosaMTA`, which is a stub implementation for a RDK test interface related to MTA (Multimedia Terminal Adapter) functionalities. It sets up RPC method bindings for various MTA-related operations, including retrieving status info, configuration, and diagnostics. The class also declares associated functions for processing these RPC requests.

classes.name: CosaMTA
classes.description: A stub class implementing RPC methods for MTA functionalities, derived from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer for JSON-RPC communication.

methods.description: Initializes the module with a specific version.

methods.description: Checks post-requisites after running tests.
